title: == sync, corrected by elderman == @elder_man
subtitle: A video showing the number of finding chimpanzees on the screen is real, and part of the research under way at the Primate Research Institute of Kyoto University.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The chimpanzee video quickly shows the location of numbers 1-9 on the touch screen, demonstrating its ability to remember their location by clicking (in sequential order) squares that covered those numbers after part of a second.
